Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.utils.ResourceManager
public final class ResourceManager extends Object
Singleton class responsible for managing the current Resource instance and providing media-related operations for it.

    • createMediaNode

      public javafx.scene.Node createMediaNode(double width, double height, boolean isPreview) throws TrackTuneException
      Creates a JavaFX Node representing the media content of the current resource.

      The Node returned depends on the resource type:

      • For ResourceTypeEnum.link, returns a styled Label with the link type.
      • For supported image types (including PDF), returns an ImageView or a ScrollPane containing PDF pages as images. PDF previews show only the first page.
      • For supported audio/video types, returns a MediaView player or a label preview for MP3.
      • Throws an exception if the media type is unsupported.
      Parameters:
      width - the desired width of the media node
      height - the desired height of the media node
      isPreview - true if a preview version should be created (e.g., only first PDF page)
      Returns:
      a JavaFX Node that visually represents the resource media content
      Throws:
      TrackTuneException - if an I/O error occurs or media type is not supported

    • setResource
